t: Praise*pn the Lord.*s Sing*pn to the Lord*s a new song, his*ld praise in the assembly of his faithful people.
Let*pn Israel rejoice in their Maker; let*ld the people of Zion be glad in their King.
Let*ln them praise his name with dancing and*ld make music to him with timbrel and harp.
For*ln the Lord*s takes delight in his people; he*ld crowns the humble with victory.
Let*ln his faithful people rejoice in this honor and*ld sing for joy on their beds.
May*pn the praise of God be in their mouths and*ld a double-edged sword in their hands,
to*ln inflict vengeance on the nations and*ld punishment on the peoples,
to*ln bind their kings with fetters, their*ld nobles with shackles of iron,
to*ln carry out the sentence written against themâ€” this*ld is the glory of all his faithful people. Praise*pn the Lord.*s
